title: [Our Colorful Place, Dye Room]
description: Painted on each wall with a scene of a rolling meadow, the room is lit by a thin window in the ceiling.  Numerous shelves are set upon the walls, displaying each dye available in this portion of the shop.  An older halfling man sits quietly in the corner, watching the customers as they pass through.

Painted on each wall with a scene of a rolling meadow, the room is lit by a thin window in the ceiling.  Numerous shelves are set upon the walls, displaying each dye available in this portion of the shop.  A shy-looking halfling child sits quietly in the corner, sketching many customers as they pass through.
